content.body: crowlkats: Its not something I'm currently working on, but I would like to see it happen.  Is it a high enough priority on your side for deno to take the lead on it?

content.body:
> <@wanderview:matrix.org> crowlkats: Its not something I'm currently working on, but I would like to see it happen.  Is it a high enough priority on your side for deno to take the lead on it?

its not high priority. its more like a "great to have". would allow us to get rid of a path-to-regex rust port for a part of the codebase.
also, i dont feel confident i could take the lead on something like that; i still dont fully understand the spec and how things interract, i mainly just impl what i read ðŸ˜…
